config.timestamp.column.name: LASTMODIFIEDDATE
config.query: SELECT sx.PKPRODUCTNO as SKU_ID, sc.IMAGE_STYLEID as STYLE_ID, i.FKSTORENO as STORE_ID, i.QOH, i.QOHSELLABLE, i.QOHNOTSELLABLE, i.QOO, i.QBO, i.QIT, i.LASTMODIFIEDDATE, i.INV_FKORGANIZATIONNO FROM VSTORE.SKUINVENTORY i INNER JOIN (SELECT FKORGANIZATIONNO, FKSKU, PKPRODUCTNO FROM VSTORE.SKUXREF) sx ON i.FKSKU = sx.FKSKU AND i.INV_FKORGANIZATIONNO = sx.FKORGANIZATIONNO INNER JOIN (SELECT SKUCOLOR, PKSKU FROM VSTORE.SKU) s ON s.PKSKU = sx.FKSKU INNER JOIN ELCAT.STYLE_COLOURS@BEANS.HARRYROSEN.COM sc ON SUBSTR(sc.STYLEID,1,8) = i.INV_FKSTYLENO AND sc.COLOUR_ID = s.SKUCOLOR
